languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Acrobatic Artistry{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} are increased by +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Bladedancer uses {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Acrobatic Artistry{/g}, their dodge and cover efficiency are increased by +<u>(5 + AGI bonus)</u>% until the end of their next turn. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including extra turns).

Whenever the Bladedancer uses Acrobatic Artistry, their dodge and cover efficiency are increased by +(5 + AGI bonus)% until the end of the Bladedancer's next turn. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including extra turns).

Whenever the Bladedancer uses Acrobatic Artistry, their dodge and cover efficiency are increased by +(5 + AGI bonus)% until the end of the Bladedancer's next turn. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including extra turns).

Whenever the Bladedancer uses Acrobatic Artistry, their dodge and cover efficiency are increased by +(5 + AGI bonus)% until the end of their next turn. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including extra turns).

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Acrobatic Artistry{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} are increased by +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Acrobatic Artistry{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} are increased by +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} usa {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Aptitud acrobática{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} aumentan en +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Esta bonificación se duplica contra todos los ataques que realicen los enemigos durante el turno del hoja danzante (incluyendo {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}).

This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} usa {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Aptitud acrobática{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} aumentan en +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Esta bonificación se duplica contra todos los ataques que realicen los enemigos durante el turno del hoja danzante (incluyendo {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が{g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}アクロバティックな芸術性{/g}を使用するたび、自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終了するまで、その{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}が+<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%増加する。このボーナスは、ブレードダンサーのターン（{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を含む）中の敵によるすべての攻撃に対して倍になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Acrobatic Artistry{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} are increased by +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が{g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}アクロバティックな芸術性{/g}を使用するたび、自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終了するまで、その{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}が+<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%増加する。このボーナスは、ブレードダンサーのターン（{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を含む）中の敵によるすべての攻撃に対して倍になる。

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}使用{g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}杂技表演{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高<u>（5+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。若刀锋舞者在自己的回合内（包括{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}）受到敌人攻击，则针对该攻击的加值效果翻倍。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Acrobatic Artistry{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} are increased by +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}使用{g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}杂技表演{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高<u>（5+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。若刀锋舞者在自己的回合内（包括{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}）受到敌人攻击，则针对该攻击的加值效果翻倍。

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} utilise {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Talent acrobatique{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de sa couverture{/g} est augmentée de +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % jusqu'à la fin de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Ce bonus est doublé contre toute attaque ennemie réalisée pendant le tour du danselame (y compris les {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tours supplémentaires{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Acrobatic Artistry{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} are increased by +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} utilise {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Talent acrobatique{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de sa couverture{/g} est augmentée de +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % jusqu'à la fin de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Ce bonus est doublé contre toute attaque ennemie réalisée pendant le tour du danselame (y compris les {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tours supplémentaires{/g}).

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Akrobatenkunst{/g} einsetzt, werden {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} bis zum Ende seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} um +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % erhöht. Dieser Bonus wird gegen alle Angriffe durch Gegner während des Zuges des Klingentänzers verdoppelt (einschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzüge{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Acrobatic Artistry{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} are increased by +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Akrobatenkunst{/g} einsetzt, werden {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} bis zum Ende seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} um +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % erhöht. Dieser Bonus wird gegen alle Angriffe durch Gegner während des Zuges des Klingentänzers verdoppelt (einschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzüge{/g}).

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} применяет {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Акробатическое мастерство{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытия{/g} увеличиваются на <u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% до конца его следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Этот бонус удваивается против всех атак, совершаемых противниками во время хода танцора смерти (включая его {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительные ходы{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Acrobatic Artistry{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} are increased by +<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} применяет {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Акробатическое мастерство{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытия{/g} увеличиваются на <u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% до конца его следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Этот бонус удваивается против всех атак, совершаемых противниками во время хода танцора смерти (включая его {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительные ходы{/g}).

Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} применяет {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Акробатическое мастерство{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытия{/g} увеличиваются на <u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% до конца его следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Этот бонус удваивается против всех атак, совершаемых противниками во время хода танцора смерти (включая его {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительные ходы{/g}).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, her {g|f:fba331366f474215812e3633e016c459}Akrobatik Sanat{/g} kullandığında {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper etkililiği{/g} değerleri +%<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ÇEV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar artar. Bu etki, bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Bu bonus, düşmanlarca Kılıç Dansçısı'nın turu ({g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek turlar{/g} da dâhil) esnasında yapılan tüm saldırılarda iki katına çıkar.

This bonus is doubled against all attacks made by enemies during the Bladedancer's turn (including {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}).
